content: लालाटिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ललाटं प्रभोर्भाग्यं पश्पति ठञ्] {@--1@} Being on or relating to the forehead. {@--2@} Arising from or dependent on fate; प्राप्तिस्तु लालाटिकी <ls>Udb.</ls> {@--3@} Useless; low, vile. {@--4@} Attentive, vigilant. --कः {@--1@} An attentive servant (<ab>lit.</ab> one who watches his master's countenance and learns by it what is necessary to be done). {@--2@} An idler, a careless or useless person. {@--3@} A kind of embrace.
